glad I was able to help and that you have a supportive partner! honestly these conditions and the interactions between them (e.g. not being able to take SSRI‚Äôs for the OCD because they cause bipolar mania) can be very tough. these subs are here for you so please always feel free to reach out!

not at all! I wouldn‚Äôt say that I‚Äôm experiencing any significant side effects right now really. I‚Äôm on a relatively small dose of lithium (150mg in the morning and 300mg at night) so I just need to make sure I‚Äôm drinking water and eating salty food but I don‚Äôt worry about lithium poisoning for example. The depakine can give me nystagmus in higher doses so I‚Äôm sticking to a lower dose (there were also problems with it affecting my period but now I skip them with the birth control anyway). It can also give hand tremors but the clondine helps with that. The clonidine is a beta blocker so I just need to make sure I drink water and eat salty food with it again to avoid dizziness (especially when standing up for example). The xanax can make me dissociate sometimes, so I take crumbs (quarter of a pill or so) of the lowest dose. Focalin can affect sleep and possibly induce mania/overstimulation so I take crumbs of it like the xanax and it fairly works!

Bipolar 2, GAD, CPTSD, ADHD, and OCD here. Lithium has been a life saver. Also depakine (valproic acid), clonidine, and as needed xanax and/or focalin. Hang in there, it took me lots of trials but for now this cocktail does the job.

I use the fury edge dosing caps and just fill them (their max capacity is 0.2g). there are a lot of factors too (see my other comment) and my tolerance is fucked so lol

honestly it doesn‚Äôt work every time and there are lots of factors like tolerance, the strain, the temp I vape at, how many puffs etc. I also take adhd meds and drink lots of caffeine so I guess that helps? you don‚Äôt wanna do it to the point where you‚Äôre high or where you even feel it, just wanna get a slight mood lift and then it‚Äôs almost like that feeling when you‚Äôre too high and every sound/touch/smell is amplified but now it‚Äôs just your brain focusing that attention to studying

just saw your profile snd fuck are you me? cause exactly the same thing! was suicidal and did shrooms first time in november 2019 and they saved my life. been doing them once a month ever since until march. highest dose I‚Äôve done was I think ~3g of ape and now I have a 5g extract but problem is I don‚Äôt have a trip sitter + don‚Äôt feel comfortable tripping with my roommates in the apartment cause I cry and act like a fucking child lol. shrooms are truly amazing and I know I said I can‚Äôt talk about the mood wise but actually the way I described it to my therapist is that it‚Äôs like tripping on shrooms (all the appreciation to life, self-love and compassion etc.) and I keep wondering if it‚Äôs the medications or actually the weed microdosing. I‚Äôll take a t-break soon and see what happens

to be fair, I only started recently and so haven‚Äôt gathered much insight about how it affects other aspects in my life besides academics and mood. I‚Äôm also going through some medicational changes that could be influencing my mood so it‚Äôs really just the academics that I can talk about. 

I use a dry herb vaporizer with dosing capsules. no more than 0.1-0.2g of weed in each cap. the temperature range also gives you control over the high (how high you wanna get and body vs mind high). I currently have a high tolerance and can still get baked when vaping a couple caps with higher temps, but when I stick to the lower temps I get a decent mood lift/slight buzz, reduced anxiety, and a general feeling of being calmer and more focused.  

lol I‚Äôd be happy to help you finish your weed. do you smoke while microdosing psychs? if so, is it shrooms or acid? when I‚Äôve tried microdosing shrooms before I‚Äôd then get thought loops when I smoke which is weird cause I was only taking 0.05g and it isn‚Äôt a potent batch or anything.

I try to remind myself that it‚Äôs okay and I have nothing but time to try again and again until I achieve what I want (even if ‚Äúlater‚Äù than others). Your worth is not measured by your productivity but sometimes it‚Äôs hard to realize that especially if, like me, you feel like that overachieving manic person is the ‚Äúreal‚Äù you. It already takes a lot of effort just to take care of ourselves and survive (ESPECIALLY with everything going on now) and I‚Äôm really proud of you for all the work you‚Äôre doing!

Hi. I have late work from before March, multiple mental health conditions, and pretty much haven‚Äôt done any shit since quarantine started too. It sucks ass and I‚Äôm sorry you‚Äôre dealing with this. 
My professors have been fairly accommodating with a few slight exceptions. If yours turn out not to be as understanding, you can usually work it through with the DRC. My therapist also wrote me a letter that included how my lack of communication is due to my mental health and the pandemic impact instead of carelessness etc. Something similar from your doctor can help. 
Just remember that in the end you and your health come first. You have all the time ahead of you and school is only one part of your life. Take good care and stay hydrated! I‚Äôm here if you ever want to talk

Sorry but I have to remind you that you don‚Äôt know the whole story before making assumptions of what‚Äôs on me and what‚Äôs on them etc. I know that being friends with an ex won‚Äôt work for me, and I said ‚Äúso-called-relationship‚Äù because it‚Äôs complicated. I told them to be friends before a romantic relationship ‚Äúfully‚Äù developed between us (they‚Äôre in a polyamorous relationship and it wasn‚Äôt clear what are we to each other exactly but it was heading in that direction and we were comfortable with no label).  In other words, I meant ‚Äústay just friends‚Äù. Sorry if I‚Äôm coming off strong but I haven‚Äôt slept, English is my second language so it‚Äôs hard to put thoughts into words properly, and seeing an assumption that I‚Äôll try to be friends with an ex after something was official and ended officially did hurt me because I‚Äôve been there and know the pain. 

I‚Äôm in therapy twice a week, on a bunch of medications, doing my best with meditation/grounding/other exercises, and I‚Äôve been by myself for a long, long time (sometimes going days without human contact even). Yet I can‚Äôt remember the last time I was happy/at peace where I wasn‚Äôt bipolar manic or it didn‚Äôt involve drugs.

Side note: I‚Äôm AFAB and have been on valproic acid since I was 17 (almost 3 years now). I did notice side effects related to my period (PCOS and PMDD symptoms mainly during the 2 weeks before it) but I‚Äôve been on the birth control to skip periods for 9 months and the symptoms pretty much disappeared. Other than that it works really well for relatively stabilizing me even if I‚Äôm not on other meds. I‚Äôd say discuss it with your doctor to undersrand it more as it has good potential

This hits too close. I‚Äôm really sorry and I wish I knew how to help but maybe you find a bit of comfort in knowing that we‚Äôre both lonely together. Adopting a cat is helping me but isn‚Äôt enough unfortunately.

Like you said, fuck anyone who tells you to ignore the importance of having a support system. We‚Äôre tribal animals and you‚Äôre not supposed to go through this alone. I agree with the comment wondering if your therapist is trauma informed cause if they‚Äôre they definitely shouldn‚Äôt be saying this. I‚Äôm sorry it‚Äôs like this. I hope it gets better for us and we find people who care about us as much as we‚Äôve been solely caring about ourselves...

hm I see your point but wanted to put this out herr: I have cptsd and know that weed that gives me a sativa effect is better for me and for a lot of other cptsd folks (I think someone also mentioned it in the comments). the weed experience is fairly personal tbh.

I used to get the same symptoms two weeks before my period. I have bipolar as well and my mood swings are the worst at that time (mostly a mixed state/very rapid cycling). My doctor put me on a combination birth control pill for the PMDD/PCOS (I only take the active pills not the placebos so I skip periods). My life has been much better ever since.

Unfortunately I do recognize it. Like another comment mentioned it could be a form of dissociation. I try to focus on some physical sensations that I‚Äôm experiencing (petting my cat and feeling how soft she is/her weight against my lap, lying in a bath...etc) which is similar to a lot of grounding/meditation exercises that may help

I‚Äôm so sorry you had to go through that. Hope you‚Äôre better now. If you can, try to just sit down and focus on breathing in and exhaling slowly from your mouth. Sometimes intrusive thoughts still pop up in your head, but forcing myself to empty my mind + convincing myself that there‚Äôs absolutely nothing I should be doing/nowhere I should be now works. Another thing that can help is lying down in a half-filled bath so that your ears are under water and closing your eyes. You‚Äôve gotten through worse things and I believe you can get through this. Stay safe and take care üíú
This used to happen to me two weeks before every period. My doctor put me on the birth control combination pill and now I skip periods. My mood is much more stable
